text:
Mai Tai Sing (December 22, 1923 – July 11, 2018) was an American actress, dancer and businesswoman. She was born in Oakland, California. She was known for her roles in "Hong Kong", "Forbidden", "Strange Portrait" and "The New Adventures of China Smith".
Sing died in Honolulu, Hawaii on July 11, 2018 from heart disease, aged 94.

annotations.surface_form: The New Adventures of China Smith
